name: Table
maker: Martin Carlin, Circular plaque painted by Jacques-François Micaud, Sèvres Manufactory
description: Table; Martin Carlin (French, born Germany, about 1730 - 1785, master 1766), Circular plaque painted by Jacques-François Micaud (French, 1732/1735 - 1811), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; table about 1773; porcelain 1773; Oak veneered with tulipwood, ebony, and holly; set with soft-paste porcelain plaques; gilt bronze mounts; 73.3 x 40 cm (28 7/8 x 15 3/4 in.); 70.DA.75; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Table
medium: Oak veneered with tulipwood, ebony, and holly; set with soft-paste porcelain plaques; gilt bronze mounts
